purpose.para: This macro is used to register a type, that is defined inside of a class. After successful registration the type can be reflected. This macro is equivalent to the BOOST_MIRROR_REG_TYPE_GLOBAL_SCOPE macro.

description.para: This macro is equivalent to the BOOST_MIRROR_REG_TYPE_EMB macro. See the documentation of BOOST_MIRROR_REG_TYPE_EMB for more details.
